title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity from extinction.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: A daydreamer escapes his mundane life by embarking on a global journey of self-discovery and adventure.

title: Wonder
description: A boy with facial differences enters a mainstream school, inspiring those around him to see beyond appearances.

title: CODA
description: The only hearing member of a deaf family pursues her passion for singing, challenging family dynamics.

title: The Royal Tenenbaums
description: A dysfunctional family of prodigies reunites when their estranged father announces his terminal illness.

title: August: Osage County
description: A family crisis brings the strong-willed women of the Weston family back to their dysfunctional home.

title: En man som heter Ove
description: A grumpy retiree forms an unexpected friendship with his new neighbors, leading to a change in perspective.

title: Her
description: A lonely man develops an emotional connection with an artificial intelligence operating system.

title: The worst person in the world
description: A young woman navigates through love and life, facing the complexities of adulthood and self-discovery.

title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
description: A Buddhist monk's life unfolds in a tranquil monastery, experiencing the cyclical nature of existence.
